mapper.select: SELECT ID, SOM_TITLE, SOM_CATEGORY, SOM_ADDRESS, SOM_TYPE, SOM_START_DATE, SOM_END_DATE, SOM_LIKE, SOM_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_SOM WHERE SOM_CATEGORY = #{somCategory} ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT ID, SOM_TITLE, SOM_CATEGORY, SOM_ADDRESS, SOM_TYPE, SOM_START_DATE, SOM_END_DATE, SOM_LIKE, SOM_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_SOM WHERE SOM_TYPE = #{somType} ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT ID, SOM_TITLE, SOM_CATEGORY, SOM_ADDRESS, SOM_TYPE, SOM_START_DATE, SOM_END_DATE, SOM_LIKE, SOM_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_SOM ORDER BY ID DESC

mapper.select: SELECT sc.ID AS sc_id, CASE sc.SOM_CHECK_IS_CHECKED WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS sc_is_checked, sc.SOM_CHECK_CONTENT AS sc_content, sc.MEMBER_ID AS sc_member_id, sc.SOM_ID AS sc_som_id, sci.ID AS sci_id, sci.SOM_CHECK_IMAGE_PATH AS sci_path, sci.SOM_CHECK_IMAGE_NAME AS sci_name, sci.SOM_CHECK_ID AS sci_check_id FROM TBL_SOM_CHECK sc LEFT JOIN TBL_SOM_CHECK_IMAGE sci ON sc.ID = sci.SOM_CHECK_ID WHERE sc.ID = #{id}

SELECT TBSJ.ID, TBSJ.SOM_ID, TBM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBMP.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, TBMP.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME FROM TBL_SOM_JOIN TBSJ JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBSJ.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER_PROFILE TBMP ON TBM.ID = TBMP.MEMBER_ID WHERE SOM_ID = #{somId} ORDER BY TBSJ.ID DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_SOM_JOIN WHERE SOM_ID = #{somId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_LIKED FROM TBL_SOM_LIKE WHERE SOM_ID = #{somId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE TBL_SOM_LIKE WHERE SOM_ID = #{somId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};
